column4: +heeellpp I installed Kde full but itwont work, I get display 0 busy error when  itry & run from terminal & then log off...
how do i fix this? everything fr kde is installed
I have edubuntu trying 2 run ubuntu & kde trying 2 run, how do I fix this problem?? I updated x386 img & graphics & that started this problem
can you elaborate on the problem?
is it possible too remove kde & clean cache re-install without crashing system?
how did you install kde and what were using before?
and this started only after installing kde?
what kind of display issue?  did you try a new user?
try a new user and see if gnome works ok
is one of them a new user you just created?
can you try to be a bit more specific about your problem?  Does gnome start to load?  Do you get dropped to a terminal?  etc.
in kdm you can click on sessions and choose gnome
I've never seen that before.  If you feel the kde install caused it, you may want to also ask in #kubuntu
